de.ityx.contex.impl.document

Class ImageForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.contex.impl.document.Form
      • de.ityx.contex.impl.document.ImageForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ImageForm
extends Form
    Extends the Class Form to hold an additional (multipage) image and a List of Rendered BufferedImages
    Author:
    andi
